control

Class MyFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • control.MyFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class MyFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    This is a graphical user interface for the simulation of a grammar based compression process for a HyperGraph object. This class has a step-by-step simulation for the compression process and hat a interface for import a HyperGraph from a text file. The graph is displayed using the graphstream library. Therefore we could determine the style using a css stylesheet.
    Author:
    Matthias DÃ¼rksen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setController

        private void setController(Controller controller)
        Setter for the Controller.
        Parameters:
        controller - reference for the controler.

      • refreshGraph

        public void refreshGraph(HyperGraph hyperGraph,
                         java.lang.String text,
                         Tuple<java.util.LinkedList<GraphNode>,java.util.LinkedList<Edge>> markedElements,
                         Digram nextDigram)
        Method to update the UI for the next step of the compression simulation.
        Parameters:
        hyperGraph - current graph of the new step of the compression.
        text - the description text that will be added to the textarea.
        markedElements - contains all Elements of the HyperGraph which should be marked (here for all elements which will be replaced in the next step).
        nextDigram - the current digram which is executed in the next step.

      • newGraphSelected

        private void newGraphSelected(HyperGraph hyperGraph)
        Resets the UI for a new compression process for the HyperGraph in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        hyperGraph - the HyperGraph which will be the next graph for the compression.

      • markElements

        private void markElements(Tuple<java.util.LinkedList<GraphNode>,java.util.LinkedList<Edge>> markedElements)
        Sets all elements of the parameter in the graph on the style attribute 'marked'. Here this is used to display which elements will be replaced in the next step.
        Parameters:
        markedElements - elements that should be marked.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Launches the application.
        Parameters:
        args - arguments for the main method, not used here.
